/usr/bin/g++-4.6   -O2 -g     -pthread CMakeFiles/hector_map_server.dir/src/hector_map_server.cpp.o  -o ../bin/hector_map_server -rdynamic -L/opt/ros/groovy/lib -ltf -lmessage_filters -lroscpp -l:/usr/lib/libboost_signals-mt.so -l:/usr/lib/libboost_filesystem-mt.so -lrosconsole -l:/usr/lib/libboost_regex-mt.so -l:/usr/lib/liblog4cxx.so -lxmlrpcpp -lroscpp_serialization -lrostime -l:/usr/lib/libboost_date_time-mt.so -l:/usr/lib/libboost_system-mt.so -l:/usr/lib/libboost_thread-mt.so -lpthread -lcpp_common -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/groovy/lib
